titles.title: Permanency for Children Act of 2017

To amend part D of title IV of the Social Security Act to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to modify the Federal Parent Locator Service to improve search functions and include State responsible father registry search functions, and for other purposes.
Permanency for Children Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

bill.summary:
Permanency for Children Act of 2017
This bill requires the Department of Health and Human Services to modify the Federal Parent Locator Service to allow state agencies that administer responsible-father registries to electronically exchange identifying information of mothers and putative fathers with other states.
